text: Juan Feliciano (born April 6, 1980) is a Dominican former baseball player.Juan Feliciano Japanese, Winter & Mexican Leagues Statistics & History | Baseball- Reference.com He played for the Hiroshima Toyo Carp in the Central League. ==References== ==External links== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Águilas Cibaeñas players Category:Bet Shemesh Blue Sox players Category:Dominican Republic expatriate baseball players in Israel Category:Dominican Republic expatriate baseball players in Japan Category:Dominican Republic expatriate baseball players in Mexico Category:Hiroshima Toyo Carp players Category:Mexican League baseball pitchers Category:Nippon Professional Baseball pitchers Category:Petroleros de Minatitlán players Category:Sportspeople from Santo Domingo
title: Juan Feliciano
